name: Dark Sun
description:
Accompany a wanderer through their dying world while they approach their end. Uncover why the world has become this way. This game is a puzzle-platformer with RPG elements, meaning that you can interact with most of the world.


Features:
The game is free but I get your time. No, you can't have it back it's in my secret box.

Original OST that my friend says is good.

You play as yourself.

A bit of text.

Time-based gameplay.

An annoying gremlin.

One ending.

Cat-themed religion.

A certain number of secrets.

30 minutes to 500 hours of playtime depending on how much time you take.

This is just a game I made for fun- it's not supposed to be taken too seriously.

F2 = Fullscreen
V (Keyboard) - Square (PS) - X (Xbox) = Interact
